dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset of highly variable geometric shapes for benchmarking the classification performance of learning models on vector polygons. The dataset consists of 26 Latin alphabet character glyph geometries of fonts gathered from an online source, with 1,413 sans serif and 1,002 serif fonts, producing 2D simple polygon geometries compliant with OpenGeospatialConsortium.
dcterms:title: Glyph Dataset

dcterms:description: A building geometry dataset designed to test the generalizability of learning models on spatial objects. The dataset contains 10,000 real-world building footprints extracted from OpenStreetMap, labelled by 10 categories based on a template matching to letters.
dcterms:title: OSM Dataset
